jcr:content.jcr:description: Send an Altra Running SmartGift to your loved one! Choose a gift, make sure they love it, and weâ€™ll send you a checkout link and deliver it right to their door.
jcr:content.pageTitle: Send a Gift with SmartGift | Altra Running

image.alt: "Gift with SmartGift" overlaying a background of mountains
Red outline of a wrapped gift

text.text:
SEND A SMARTGIFT TO THEIR
SMART PHONE IN THREE EASY STEPS.

text_1144646859.text:
PICK OUT A GIFT 

Find the gift you'd like to send, and we'll send an instant link via text or email.

text_1144646859_copy.text:
THEY PERFECT IT 

Do they love the gift? You can check out. If not, they can change the size or color, or choose something else of equal value.

WE DELIVER IT 

We'll send you an easy checkout link. All they need to provide is a delivery address.

customhtml2_copy_cop_870452284.customHTML: LOOK FOR THE WHEN YOU SHOP.
